snippet: The Red Storm are still looking for their first Big East victory of the season after the Wildcats went on a 10-1 run late in the second half to break open a close game.
lead_paragraph: The Red Storm are still looking for their first Big East victory of the season after the Wildcats went on a 10-1 run late in the second half to break open a close game.

headline.main: Villanova Rediscovers 3-Point Touch, and St. John’s Loses Way
headline.print_headline: Villanova Rediscovers 3-Point Touch, and St. John’s Loses Way
